steps.name: an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/1336443999071195137" endpoint
the response status code is 200
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/1336443999071195137" endpoint
the response status code is 200
the response body contains key:"data.id" with value:"1336443999071195137"
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/1336443999071195137" endpoint
the response status code is 200
the response body is equal to "getTweetResponse"
the response schema is equal to "getTweetResponse_Schema"
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/1336443999071195137" endpoint with query parameters key:"tweet.fields" value:"public_metrics,author_id,created_at"
the response status code is 200
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/1336443999071195137" endpoint with query parameters key:"tweet.fields" value:"public_metrics,author_id,created_at"
the response status code is 200
the response body is equal to "getTweetResponse_tweetFields"
the response schema is equal to "getTweetResponse_tweetFields_Schema"
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/1336443999071195137" endpoint with query parameters keys:"tweet.fields&&expansions" values:"public_metrics,author_id,created_at&&author_id"
the response status code is 200
the response status message contains "OK"
the response body contains list "includes.users" of size "1"
the response body contains keys:"data.public_metrics.retweet_count&&data.author_id" with values:"0&&749410536517988352&&"
the response body contains string "like_count"

elements.name: Post tweet - delete tweet - get tweet

steps.name: an authorized "twitter_v1.1" user
I send a "POST" request to the "statuses/update.json" endpoint with query parameters key:"status" value:"Test Tweet 1"
the response status code is 200
the response body contains key:"text" with value:"Test Tweet 1"
store the response value with key:"id" as "{id}"
I send a "POST" request to the "statuses/destroy/{key}.json" endpoint with path parameter "{id}"
the response status code is 200
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/{key}" endpoint with path parameter "{id}"
the response status code is 404
the response status message contains "HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found"

elements.name: Post tweet - favourite tweet - delete tweet

steps.name: an authorized "twitter_v1.1" user
I send a "POST" request to the "statuses/update.json" endpoint with query parameters key:"status" value:"Test Tweet 2"
the response status code is 200
the response body contains string "id"
store the response value with key:"id" as "{id}"
I send a "POST" request to the "favorites/{key}.json" endpoint with path parameter "create" and with query parameters key:"id" value:"{id}"
the response body contains key:"favorite_count&&favorited" with value:"1&&true"
I send a "POST" request to the "statuses/destroy/{key}.json" endpoint with path parameter "{id}"
the response status code is 200
the response status message contains "HTTP/1.1 200 OK"
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "tweets/search/stream/rules" endpoint
the response status code is 200
the response status message contains "OK"
the response body contains list "data" of size "2"
the response body contains key:"data.value[0]" with value:"Cat in a hat"
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "POST" request to the "tweets/search/stream/rules" endpoint with body "postRuleRequest"
the response status code is 201
the response status message contains "HTTP/1.1 201 Created"
the response body contains key:"meta.summary.created" with value:"1"
the response body contains key:"data.value" with value:"[Test]"
store the response value with key:"data.id" as "{id}"
I send a "POST" request to the "tweets/search/stream/rules" endpoint with value "{id}" in body "deleteRuleRequest"
the response status code is 200
the response body contains key:"meta.summary.deleted" with value:"1"
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "POST" request to the "tweets/search/stream/rules" endpoint with query parameters keys:"dry_run" values:"false" and body "postRuleRequest"
the response status code is 201
store the response value with key:"data.id" as "{id}"
I send a "POST" request to the "tweets/search/stream/rules" endpoint with query parameters keys:"dry_run" values:"false" and body "postRuleRequest2"
the response status code is 201
store the response value with key:"data.id" as "{id2}"
I send a "POST" request to the "tweets/search/stream/rules" endpoint with query parameters keys:"dry_run" values:"false" and values "{id},{id2}" in body "deleteRuleRequest2"
the response status code is 200
the response body contains key:"meta.summary.deleted" with value:"2"

name: Common Steps
description: The steps in this file should be generic enough to be used in different projects

steps.name: an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "GET_TWEET_ID" twitter endpoint
the response status code is 200
the response body is equal to pojo "GetTweetResponse"
an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "GET" request to the "GET_TWEET" twitter endpoint with query parameters key:"ids" value:"1336443999071195137"
the response status code is 200
the response body is equal to "GetTweetResponse_queryParam"

elements.name: Add/delete rule with pojo and enums for endpoint

steps.name: an authorized "twitter_v2" user
I send a "POST" request to the "RULES" endpoint with values "pojo test, this is a pojo test" in pojo "PostRuleRequest"

arguments.val: pojo test, this is a pojo test

steps.name: the response status code is 201
I delete the rule from the latest response
the response status code is 200
the response body contains key:"meta.summary.deleted" with value:"1"
